flawed_nl_solution:
Dana has 15 more pencils than Jayden who has 20, so Dana has 20+15 = <<20+15=38>>38 pencils
Jayden has 20 pencils which is twice as much as Marcus's so Marcus has 20/2 = <<20/2=10>>10 pencils
Dana has 38-10 = <<38-10=28>>28 more pencils than Marcus
#### 28

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 35, not 38. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
